text: Two Arabian Knights is a 1927 American World War I romantic comedy movie directed by Lewis Milestone and starring William Boyd, Mary Astor, Louis Wolheim, Ian Keith, Michael Vavitch, Michael Visaroff, Boris Karloff. It was distributed by United Artists and was based on the 1924 story of the same name. It won an Academy Award in 1929. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1927 comedy movies Category:1920s American romance movies Category:1920s romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone
title: Two Arabian Knights
